thread.title: Friedsam beats Larsson to reach maiden final in Linz
thread.title_full: Friedsam beats Larsson to reach maiden final in Linz

author: wtopstaff
title: Friedsam beats Larsson to reach maiden final in Linz
text:
By The Associated Press October 17, 2015 10:30 am 
LINZ, Austria (AP) — Anna-Lena Friedsam of Germany advanced to her first career WTA final by beating Johanna Larsson of Sweden 6-3, 4-6, 7-5 at the Generali Ladies on Saturday. 
The 118th-ranked Friedsam will play seventh-seeded Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova or Kirsten Flipkens in Sunday’s final. 
Friedsam didn’t concede a break point until leading 4-2 in the second set but then lost five games in a row. She trailed 5-3 in the final set but took the last four games to close out the win. 
Friedsam was ranked a career-high 73rd in July when she sprained her ankle and was out for six weeks. She failed to win another match until reaching the quarterfinals in Tashkent, Uzbekistan, two weeks ago. 
The 59th-ranked Larsson won her maiden WTA title in Bastad, Sweden, in July. Topics:
